Information.title: Language support
Information.message:
Qwotables' possibility of changing the language is yet to be implemented. Until this is done, Qwotables' quotes and wisdom will be in English. However, since the text in the app, that is not to be parsed in a json, is already translated into German, the application will show German text when your device's language is German.


Update to the newest version to fix this.

Information.title: Known issues
Information.message:
Some app activities are not following the color theme yet.
The "Update available" card is visible constantly

Information.title: No quotes
Information.message: Due to a few changes on how Qwotable displays quotes in the future, I made some changes to the file, the quotes are getting parsed from. Pwease excuse that until the next update, Qwotable can't display any quotes.

Information.title: Important news to the color scheme feature
Information.message: Due to some limitations on older Android devices, the color scheme will be disabled for every Android device that runs Android 9 and below. Currently,  it is the only possibility to guarantee a good experience

Information.title: No wisdom
Information.message: Due to a few changes on how Qwotable displays wisdom in the future, I made some changes to the file, the wisdom are getting parsed from. Please excuse that until the next update, Qwotable can't display any wisdom.

Information.title: Wisdom disappear
Information.message: On tablets: The wisdom are disappearing when the dialog for copy and share is shown. It is yet not clear what causes this bug but I'll do my best to fix this.

Information.title: Language reset
Information.message: There currently is a problem with selecting languages as the app's restart resets it to the System's language.

Information.title: Quotes and Copyright ©️
Information.message: I was made aware that quotes and wisdom may be protected by copyright. With this [new to me] knowledge, I feel compelled to delete quotes and wisdom I used so far to impede trouble. I got a source of quotes, I am willing to use as these quotes are usable. Please don't be mad. This is to keep Qwotable alive.
